a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Area of permanent meadows and pastures, 1961 to 2022
This is the land used for livestock grazing. The total land use for livestock farming is higher as it additionally
requires cropland used to grow animal feed.
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024)
